title: Tamil Nadu govt clears Rs 44,125 cr project proposals, including three renewable energy policies
description: The Tamil Nadu Cabinet sanctioned Rs 44,125 crore for 15 projects expected to create over 24,700 jobs. Additionally, three renewable energy policies targeting 20,000 MW by 2030 were approved. On August 17, the Chief Minister will open an industrial housing facility for Foxconn employees in Kancheepuram.
